title: As much I love Ascension... I wouldn't mind other game modes, such as Urf and Nexus Siege.

replies.body:
Nexus siege gets old quick. The same champs that dominate ARAM dominate there as well, but unlike ARAM you get to play a lopsided matchup twice. 

Ascension games are fast and you can pick pretty much anyone you want and have a good chance at winning. Shaco and Teemo are the only real problem champs there and even they can be dealt with.

I can't speak on URF since I've never been interested in it, but I see it gets a lot of complaints even when it is available.
Ascension's my second favourite, after Dominion. Hoping for it to come back on the queue some day.
I dont get it. As far as im aware ascension is dominion with a prettier map,less towers to capture and a epic monster.

Well i love ascennsion mostly... Out of all game modes, evne more than urf...  Only because you have complete freedome there, no lane restrictions and you can test new builds or funny ones :3 And i like freedom ;3

Urf is coming soon as it's on the PBE atm.

EDIT: all random URF anyways.
